name: TextMaker Document Template
summary: Learn about .TMVX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: TMVX files are saved in a proprietary format and are similar to Microsoft Word templates (.DOT or .DOTX files). They may be converted to other formats in TextMaker, including .PDF, .DOC, .DOCX, DOT, DOTX, TMD, TMDX, TMV, .ODT, .PSW, and .RTF.

You can create a TMVX file by selecting File → Save or Save as, and then choosing the TMVX format. You can open a TMVX file by selecting File → Open and navigating to the TMVX file. You can also choose File → New and select the TMVX template from which you want to create your new document. TMVX files are saved by default in the "Templates [version]" folder of the "SoftMaker" folder in your "Documents" folder path.
NOTE: TMVX files replaced .TMV files as the primary file type used to store templates.

description: A TMVX file is a document template created by TextMaker, a word processing program included with Softmaker Office. It may store text, drawn objects, tables, images, and page formatting information. TMVX files are used to create .TMD and .TMDX documents with the same formatting or content.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .tmvx file in SoftMaker Office TextMaker 2018
images.caption: TMVX file open in SoftMaker Office TextMaker 2018
